about.title: D-Day Pixel Wall
about.line1:
Your goal becomes a single pixel,
creating a giant D-Day Pixel Wall that fulfills everyone's dreams.
about.line2:
From moments you must achieve like exams, trips, and anniversaries,
to small challenges like starting a workout or reading a bookâ€”
record your D-Day here and share it with the world.
about.line3:
Send 'likes' to other people's goals,
and the energy of support and inspiration comes together to complete a huge digital art.
about.line4:
Everyone's journey is different, but we move forward together.
Your day becomes a light that fills this wall.

page.help_text: Drag to explore, and click an empty space to add a D-Day.

registration_modal.title: Add My D-Day
registration_modal.help_text: D-Days are registered anonymously. After a short ad, you can permanently leave your D-Day on the canvas.
registration_modal.error_date_past: D-Day must be a future date.
registration_modal.error_date_future: D-Day must be within one year.
